alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany; Washington (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued March 18 at 4:14AM EDT until March 18 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in areas of dense fog. * WHERE...In Maryland, Washington, Extreme Western Allegany and Central and Eastern Allegany Counties. In West Virginia, Morgan, Berkeley, Western Mineral and Eastern Mineral Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany; Washington
